casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Thomas STOUT, Jr. 83P17-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 16, 2017 Thomas (Jr.) Stout, for Stout, Thomas (Jr.). Kimberly N. Callahan, Assistant Attorney General, N. Lorrin Freeman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 16th of March 2017 by Defendant for Petition for Writ of Prohibition:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 16th of March 2017."
